mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.source_id AS "sourceId", a.source_table AS "sourceTable", a.content AS "content", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.ip AS "ip", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.audit_user_id AS "auditUserId", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u7.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u7 ON u7.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_portal_comments( id, parent_id, parent_ids, source_id, source_table, content, user_id, ip, create_date, audit_user_id, audit_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{sourceId}, #{sourceTable}, #{content}, #{user.id}, #{ip}, #{createDate}, #{auditUserId}, #{auditDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_portal_comments SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, source_id = #{sourceId}, source_table = #{sourceTable}, content = #{content}, user_id = #{user.id}, ip = #{ip}, audit_user_id = #{auditUserId}, audit_date = #{auditDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM cms_collection a WHERE a.source_table = #{sourceTable} AND a.source_id = #{sourceId} AND a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT * FROM cms_portal_comments a WHERE a.source_table = #{sourceTable} AND a.source_id = #{sourceId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM cms_portal_comments WHERE source_table = 'cms_news' AND source_id = '1' ) m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT source_id, COUNT(source_id) tradeCount FROM cms_praise WHERE source_table = 'cms_portal_comments' AND operate_type = '0' GROUP BY source_id ) a ON m.id = a.source_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT source_id, COUNT(source_id) praiseCount FROM cms_praise WHERE source_table = 'cms_portal_comments' AND operate_type = '1' GROUP BY source_id ) b ON m.id = b.source_id
update cms_portal_comments set status=#{status} where id=${id}
